envGuide: When 'useEnvForCredentials' is enabled, the bot will use the process.env keys for email and password. This helps to secure your credentials. You can find the 'env' in Render's environment tab or Replit secrets.

UPDATE.Info: This section manages automatic package updates. Set 'Package' to false to disable automatic updates. To exclude specific packages, set them to true and add them to the 'EXCLUDED' list.

Setup.Info: Design your own custom terminal Titlebar. The title must not contain numbers.
Setup.Theme: Customize your console effortlessly with various theme colors. Explore Aqua, Fiery, Blue, Orange, Pink, Red, Retro, Sunlight, Teen, Summer, Flower, Ghost, Purple, Rainbow, and Hacker themes to enhance your terminal logs.
